name: Arrearage Management Plan (AMP)
description: Save up to $8,000 on overdue utility bills for CARE customers; must owe at least $500 and be more than 90 days past due
fullDescription: PG&E's Arrearage Management Plan helps CARE-enrolled customers reduce their past-due utility debt by forgiving up to $8,000 over 12 months when they make consistent on-time payments.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $8,000 in debt forgiveness
- 1/12 of debt forgiven each month
- Must make on-time payments for 12 months
- Prevents disconnection while enrolled
- Can re-enroll if you fall behind
- Works alongside CARE discount
howToGetIt:
1. Must be enrolled in PG&E CARE program
2. Must owe at least $500 on your account
3. Account must be more than 90 days past due
4. Contact PG&E or apply online to enroll
5. Make on-time monthly payments for 12 months
6. 1/12 of your debt is forgiven each month you pay on time
